abstract: Shares in JPMorgan tumbled after the trustee liquidating MF Global’s brokerage unit affirmed that he might investigate the bank for its actions as the firm collapsed.
snippet: Shares in JPMorgan tumbled after the trustee liquidating MF Global’s brokerage unit affirmed that he might investigate the bank for its actions as the firm collapsed.
lead_paragraph: After a couple of ups and downs, shares in JPMorgan Chase were trading in positive territory by Tuesday afternoon. And then they took a quick and sharp tumble.

headline.main: JPMorgan Shares Fall as MF Global Trustee Suggests Inquiry of Bank

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: “The American Giving Awards” — part awards show, part bank advertisement — had 1.5 million viewers on NBC on Saturday night, a subpar performance even by the standards of Saturday night.
snippet: “The American Giving Awards” — part awards show, part bank advertisement — had 1.5 million viewers on NBC on Saturday night, a subpar performance even by the standards of Saturday night.
lead_paragraph: Will JPMorgan Chase pay for another televised award show for charities next year? After seeing the ratings for its “American Giving Awards,” that is far from a sure thing.

headline.main: ‘Giving Awards’ From JPMorgan Chase Draws Small Audience
